author: 0.005 Seconds (3/694) @seconds_0
text: A concrete example happened today. My codex reviewer (rightly) told me the implementation in my pr was overly complex and that a small change in the downstream service could massively simplify it. However, i work in crypto, and changing the downstream block chain contract requires months of public governance changes, votes, etc. We could (and likely should) make the change it was asking for, but it was just unfeasible because of that ecosystem requirement
